pageContext.claim: “I don't know if you saw my tweets, but people like my Mount Rushmore -- But, you know why they liked it? 'Cause it was so beautiful. And behind me were these massive -- This mountain is carved so beautifully. It's beautiful. South Dakota. Beautiful. And I'm making a speech and then I realized, they wanna take down Mount Rushmore.”
pageContext.analysis: False. The claim that Democrats want to tear down Mount Rushmore is just a rumor promoted by talk radio personality Ben Shapiro.
